name: Swipe fruits :Juicy fruit splash
description:
Fun with swap color fresh fruits.
Swipe fruits juicy fruit splash is the match 3 amazing fruits and veggie puzzle game.

Features:
10 challenging levels and more in the future.
Bright graphic and cool animation effects.

How to play:
Link three same fruits or more in vertical or horizontal row to score points.
Make more than target points to complete level.
Play amazing Fruits Link Splash and tasty Fruits world.
